title: The Boston Strangler Gets Burned!
itunes:title: The Boston Strangler Gets Burned!
description: Jeremy "The Machine" Soars from Don Pepin/My Father Cigars joins Dave Garofalo & Mr Jonathan to reveal a Jamie Garcia exclusive, and we light up the brand new Jaime Reserva Especial Garcia. Then we wish Happy Birthday to Cigarlebrity Avo Uvesian who turns 86, and smoke the new Avo Trumpeta. Mr Jonathan in shades? A special message to Obama? And meet the Boston Strangler??? This and lots, lots more only on The Cigar Authority.
